Posts.Content: Happy for you , I'm still waiting & hoping
Posts.Title: Oncotype result

Posts.Content: HI, i'm in the US in NJ, the NP is probably well trained but instead of being scared take control & get a second opinion. Try a dermatologist, insist on an MD. when  you're in control you feel better. smile. good luck.
Posts.Title: Please help I am so scared

Posts.Content: Glad you went to the Derm ! Happy for you. All fears gone!!
Posts.Title: Please help I am so scared

Posts.Content: I also had a seroma after lymph node removal. (Dec. 13) It got quite large, had it drained 4 times. no arm exercise. gradually over 2 weeks it slowly disappeared. just scar tissue now. I did do walking, now I'm back to light arm exercise. don't give up.
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy

Posts.Content: HI, I also start Rad next week, first day simulator then Tuesday is "zap" day. I was given a cream called vanicream for senstitve skin, also dry red skin. I was also told if this doesn't work I can have a different cream. I'm in the US & i never heard  about the creams you have but will ask on Monday. hoping all goes well. I will have 36 treatments!
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢
